Fueled by curiosity and a dash of naiveté, two college buddies return to their ancestral home of Greene, Iowa to figure out how a modest kernel conquered America. With the help of some real farmers, oodles of fertilizer and government aide, and some genetically modified seeds, the friends manage to grow one acre of corn. Along the way, they unlock the hilarious absurdities and scary but hidden truths about America’s modern food system in this engrossing and eye-opening documentary.","poster_path":"/zVHWzV9o2FU1SasNxuiJMW2FY0V.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":3.646,"release_date":"2007-10-12","video":false,"vote_average":6.3,"vote_count":31},{"backdrop_path":"/mF2nZkkzsPRgow836ukgHiG4cHL.jpg","id":5183,"title":"Travels with My Aunt","original_title":"Travels with My Aunt","overview":"At his mother's funeral, stuffy bank clerk Henry Pulling meets his Aunt Augusta, an elderly eccentric with more-than-shady dealings who pulls him along on a whirlwind adventure as she attempts to rescue an old lover.","poster_path":"/2bycdsCdZ7oqZsLbViWRp2fnHEg.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[12,35],"popularity":7.575,"release_date":"1972-12-17","video":false,"vote_average":5.7,"vote_count":33},{"backdrop_path":"/cedu3L4MNV4BO5RGQ6grIc7x396.jpg","id":72769,"title":"Make Haste to Live","original_title":"Make Haste to Live","overview":"A single mother in New Mexico senses her own death in the hands of a mysterious stalker.","poster_path":"/7NFUTlg2bbyvn2FO6K0rRUryU0u.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[53,9648],"popularity":4.647,"release_date":"1954-03-25","video":false,"vote_average":5.6,"vote_count":11},{"backdrop_path":"/fnwuZsMTymI0d1yVaixnV6W8UZq.jpg","id":1032918,"title":"The Power of Women","original_title":"Die Macht der Frauen","overview":"Seeking the truth in a human grey area.
